page.title: 18Saturdays in Hazelbury Bryan
page.content: On Saturdays most people don't have to work or go to school, which means they can sleep a little later than usual. Many take the opportunity to take a family outing. Often that involves a shopping expedition to one of the nearby towns like Yeovil, Blandford or Dorchester, but there are many fayres, fetes, and shows to visit Usually, dads spends the weekends attending to jobs around the house or the garden, and mums, because many work, catch up with house work. The children look forward to the Saturday morning television programmes because many cartoons are shown. If the weather is fine, we often play on the village green or recreation ground. Many school children spend their time on their own because they live so far away from others.
